title: Gregg Rosenthal on Rams, Hunter Henry injury, Foles rumors (Football 05/24)
description:
Gregg Rosenthal of NFL Media joins Will Brinson to break down what the Rams have done this offseason, what we can expect from their defense with Wade Phillips unleashing Aaron Donald/Ndamukong Suh/Michael Brockers, if the pass rush and linebackers are a concern and whether or not they can go over the 10 game total next year. The guys also break down Hunter Henry's injury for the Chargers and the Nick Foles to the Browns rumors. Will discusses other headlines including the NFL's national anthem policy.

itunes:subtitle: Gregg Rosenthal joins Will Brinson to discuss the LA Rams' offseason, the expectations of the defense with the new additions, if they can top 10 wins, the new NFL national anthem policy & much more.
